description: This file contains utility functions for handling hash-based routing in a web application, specifically for a Notes app. It provides functions to parse the URL hash, extract note IDs, set the hash for specific notes, and clear the hash.

methods.name: parseHash()
methods.description: Parses the URL hash and returns a route object with the name 'note' and the note ID parameter if the hash matches the expected route format.

methods.name: getNoteIdFromHash()
methods.description: Extracts the note ID from the current hash route if available.

methods.name: setNoteHash(id, replace = false)
methods.description: Sets the URL hash to point to a specific note ID, optionally replacing the current history entry.

methods.name: clearHash(replace = false)
methods.description: Clears the URL hash, resetting it to '#'.
